specialEventConditions.title: All Rates are Non Refundable
specialEventConditions.description: Hello traveler!  Please note that all bookings at Flinders Street Hostel are non refundable.  Full payment will be processed immediately after booking is made.  Payments that do not process are subject to cancellation.  We look forward to welcoming you soon!

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
